full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

## Departmental Standing Offer for Records Storage and Shredding Services

### Reference Number: cb-5263-32392429

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a Departmental Individual Standing Offer (DISO) for secure off-site records storage and destruction services for physical records and documents. The RFSO is established for the ‘as and when requested’ basis for a period of three years, from June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2026.

## Rationale
The DISO is mandatory for the CBSA to provide secure off-site storage and destruction of government records and documents across Canada. The Standing Offer will be divided for several geographic regions, including Atlantic, Quebec, National Capital (NCR), Ontario (NOR, SOR, and GTA), Western/Prairies (PRA), and Pacific (PAC).

**Eligible Services**

- Secure off-site storage of government records and documents
- Management of government records and documents
- Destruction of physical records and documents

**Duration and Extension**

The Standing Offer is valid for a period of 3 years. The Offeror has the option to extend their offer for an additional two periods, of one year each, under the same terms and conditions and at the prices calculated in accordance with the specified formula.

**Opening Date and Closing Date**
- The Request for Standing Offer was published on 2023-05-05
- The tender closing date was 2023-05-26 at 14:00:00

**ANSI Codes**
- UNSPSC 78131602 - File Archive Storage
- UNSPSC 78000000 - Document Destruction Services

**Region**
 The work will be carried out in Canada.

### Award Information
- **Trade Agreements**
  • Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  • World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  • Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  • North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
  • Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  • Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  • Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  • Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  • Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  • CPTPP, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (
